savant.view.swing
Class ViewTrack

java.lang.Object
  savant.view.swing.ViewTrack
Direct Known Subclasses:
BAMCoverageViewTrack, BAMViewTrack, BEDViewTrack, ContinuousViewTrack, IntervalViewTrack, PointViewTrack, SequenceViewTrack
public abstract class ViewTrack
extends java.lang.Object

Class to handle the preparation for rendering of a track. Handles colour schemes and drawing instructions, getting and filtering of data, setting of vertical axis, etc. The ranges associated with various resolutions are also handled here, and the drawing modes are defined.
